forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of drizzle before 3pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 57. Northeast wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. North wind 3 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Boston, there lingers a thick veil of clouds cast across the city, hinting at the cozy embrace of the day’s chill. The high reaches for a mild 57 degrees, yet the brisk northeast winds, gusting at times with delightful vigor, remind us that autumn is cloaked in its tendencies for cool surprises. This light drizzle, teasing before the hour of three, whispers of a softer kind of precipitation, perhaps coaxing a languid stroll under an umbrella or inviting a quiet moment indoors, near a window dressed in softening light.

As the evening nestles in with a predicted low of 47, the clouds will part gently, providing a hint of celestial blue to those who linger into the dusky hours. A gentle north wind will make for a refreshing backdrop, suggesting attire that balances comfort with warmth. A light jacket layered over a cozy sweater would serve well, complemented by a sturdy pair of shoes suited for any moody puddle that may linger on the streets. One might find pleasure in a last-minute visit to a local café, the aroma of freshly ground coffee mingling with the irresistible pull of the written word, or perhaps a quiet afternoon library visit to lose oneself in contemplative chapters—both equally suitable pursuits for a day that hums with quiet elegance.
